doc.title: Kitty Hawk
doc.plot: Dayton, Ohio, bicycle mechanic brothers Wilbur and Orville Wright confound the establishment when against all odds they invent a practical flying machine and fly it off the coast of North Carolina in 1903, then must battle their own government when the Smithsonian Institution wages a war of lies and propaganda against them which threatens to ruin their reputations, their business and hard-won place in world history.
